metadata.title: Ki2lian's Portfolio
metadata.description: Full-stack web developer passionate about turning ideas into reality. Actively contributes to building websites by combining technical skills with creative insight. Naturally curious, hardworking, and driven by a love for learning in the world of web development.

hero.sr_only: Hi, I'm Killian, I turn ideas into digital reality as a web developer.
hero.description: Hi, I'm a passionate Full-Stack Web Developer dedicated to bringing ideas to life. I'm fast learner and meticulous in attention to details and quality, always striving for improvement.
